tasks.title: Audio Features
tasks.description: Implement audio features for QMK keyboard with King Gizzard guitar tabs
tasks.details: Add musical audio capabilities to the QMK configuration by collecting guitar tabs and transcribing them into QMK's audio format for playback through the keyboard.

subtasks.title: Collect King Gizzard guitar tabs
subtasks.description: Gather guitar tabs from King Gizzard songs for transcription
subtasks.details: Research and collect guitar tabs that will be suitable for QMK audio playback

subtasks.title: Transcribe tabs to QMK format in user_song_list.h
subtasks.description: Convert collected guitar tabs into QMK audio format
subtasks.details: Transcribe the guitar tabs into QMK's musical note format and add them to user_song_list.h file in the userspace
